statements: SELECT * FROM travel_expenses;
SELECT receipt_id, date, amount, category, description FROM travel_expenses;
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM travel_expenses GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT description, amount FROM travel_expenses WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM travel_expenses ORDER BY date DESC, amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM travel_expenses WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT receipt_id, category, amount FROM travel_expenses WHERE category = 'Flight' AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT receipt_id, category, description FROM travel_expenses WHERE description LIKE '%hotel%' ORDER BY receipt_id;
SELECT * FROM travel_expenses WHERE date >= '2022-06-01' AND date < '2022-07-01' ORDER BY amount DESC, date ASC;
SELECT receipt_id, category, description FROM travel_expenses WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 2000 AND category IN ('Food', 'Transportation') ORDER BY category DESC, receipt_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM receipts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, amount FROM invoices WHERE payment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT description, amount FROM receipts WHERE date = '2022-10-01';
SELECT * FROM invoices ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT id, invoice_number FROM invoices WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM receipts WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT description, amount FROM receipts WHERE date >= '2021-01-01' AND date <= '2021-06-30'
SELECT id, date, amount FROM receipts WHERE description LIKE '%food%' AND amount < 50
SELECT * FROM invoices WHERE payment_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT id, invoice_number FROM invoices WHERE amount >= 500 ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT * FROM receipts;
SELECT id, amount, date FROM invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT description, amount FROM receipts WHERE amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT category, amount, date FROM expenses ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM invoices WHERE date > '2022-01-01' AND date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM receipts ORDER BY date DESC, amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, description FROM receipts WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM expenses GROUP BY category HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM invoices WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT id, amount FROM expenses WHERE category = 'Travel' ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM Receipts LIMIT 10;
SELECT date, amount, description FROM Receipts WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT category_name FROM ExpenseCategories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT receipt_id, date, amount, description FROM Receipts WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT invoice_id, total_amount, due_date FROM Invoices WHERE due_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Receipts WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Invoices WHERE total_amount < 500 AND due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT description, amount FROM Receipts WHERE date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT category_name, amount FROM ExpenseCategories JOIN ExpenseDetails ON ExpenseCategories.category_id = ExpenseDetails.category_id WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Receipts JOIN ExpenseDetails ON Receipts.receipt_id = ExpenseDetails.expense_id WHERE Receipts.date < '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM receipts ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT receipt_id, amount, category FROM receipts WHERE category = 'Food';
SELECT vendor, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM invoices GROUP BY vendor;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE category = 'Travel' AND amount > 100;
SELECT traveler_id, name, email FROM travelers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM receipts WHERE category = 'Food' ORDER BY receipt_date DESC;
SELECT vendor, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM expenses GROUP BY vendor HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT r.receipt_id, r.amount, r.receipt_date, e.category, e.description FROM receipts r JOIN expenses e ON r.receipt_id = e.receipt_id;
SELECT t.name, t.email, COUNT(tp.plan_id) AS total_plans FROM travelers t LEFT JOIN travel_plans tp ON t.traveler_id = tp.traveler_id GROUP BY t.name, t.email;
SELECT t.name, tp.destination, tp.start_date, tp.end_date FROM travelers t JOIN travel_plans tp ON t.traveler_id = tp.traveler_id WHERE tp.start_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
